name: Venezia
startIntroPart1: Enrico Dandolo, Doge of venezia! your most serenne republic cheers you! cheers it's former glory!
startIntroPart2: will you lead Venezia back to their glory? oh Great Doge Enrico Dandolo.
declaringWar: resist is foolish, prepare for become a fine colony of venezia!
attacked: you dare to invade the Most Serenne republic of Venezia? you damn PIG!
defeated: Ho- How, how i could fail to my people, my republic, and my Home. pls, PLEASE don't Burn Venezia. i PLEDGE YOU.
introduction: Hello! i hope you're willing to trade, because otherwise i will have to force you to do so..
hateNo: We are not agreeing to that!
afterPeace: Very well, all that fighting was getting boring anyway.
tradeRequest: We bestow you the honor of this trade offer.
